feed.title: 蛛形学报 / Acta Arachnologica Sinica

entry.title: 中国延斑蛛属4新种(蜘蛛目:古筛蛛科) / Four new species of the genus Ectatosticta(Araneae,Hypochilidae)from China
entry.content:
本文报道了中国延斑蛛属(Ectatosticta Simon,1892)4新种:八戒延斑蛛,新种E.bajie sp.nov.(♂♀);大鹏延斑蛛,新种 E.dapeng sp.nov.(♂♀);如来延斑蛛,新种 E.rulai sp.nov.(♂♀);余锟延斑蛛,新种E.yukuni sp.nov.(♂♀).提供了这4种延斑蛛的描述、照片以及详细的鉴别特征. / Four new species of the spider genus Ectatosticta Simon,1892 are reported,diagnosed,described and illustrated.The new species are E.bajie sp.nov.(♂♀),E.dapeng sp.nov.(♂♀),E.rulai sp.nov.(♂♀)and E.yukuni sp.nov.(♂♀).

d.wanfangdata.com.cn

entry.title: 中国南方蜘蛛2新种:Pinelema mulunensis sp.nov.和 Stedocys vittiformis sp.nov.(蛛形纲:蜘蛛目) / Pinelema mulunensis sp.nov.and Stedocys vittiformis sp.nov.,two new species from southern China(Arachnida:Araneae)
entry.content:
依据采自中国广西壮族自治区的蜘蛛标本,本文描述了 2个新种:木论平莱蛛Pinelema mulunensis sp.nov.(泰来蛛科)和丝带斯德蛛Stedocys vittiformis sp.nov.(花皮蛛科).文中提供了 2新种的彩色外形图、生殖器鉴别特征图及模式标本分布地图.模式标本保存于湖南师范大学. / Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region of China has rich biological resource and many spider species have been found here.Two new species collected from Guangxi,Pinelema mulunensis Chen&Xu sp.nov.(male and female)and Stedocys vittiformis Liang&Xu sp.nov.(male)belonging to family Telemidae and Scytodidae respectively,are described and illustrated.Pinelema mulunensis sp.nov.is a member of Pinelema bailongensis species group.The updated keys to Pinelema bailongensis species group and to Stedocys species from China are also supplied.

d.wanfangdata.com.cn
